answers.answer: hey there, better late then never, i am at 31 weeks this week. i am starting to waddle when i walk, swaying from side to side.  i have been getting really bad heartburn again and constipation!!  oh my god and my hormones are raging!! i am so irritable and moody, and emotional!!!  i just can't help it!!

im 33 weeks and absolutely miserable! i have so much swelling in my feet ankles knees wrists and hands. i can barely walk bc of back pain. my doc had to put me on lortab for pain. its hard to do anything..ive gained about 60 lbs so far and i was small b4 i got pregnant so this weight is insane for me to handle. i may be getting induced which is fine with me! im starting to get very emotional bc i hurt so much!!

I'm 31 weeks and feeling good actually. When I lay down at the end of the day my hips REALLY hurt. Getting stretchmarks on my belly but I don't really care about stretchmarks. They don't bother me.Had a few bouts of a little heartburn. Maybe my girl will have hair! Her sisters were bald until their 2nd birthdays.I'm with Nicole- raging hormones!!!

I am 29.5 weeks (at the later end of of oct09 babies) and just thinking last night how things are starting to get harder already for me.  last time I was 31 weeks and half of my husbands family couldnt look at me and tell.  Noone commented on it until I was about 35 weeks.  I am about 10 weeks ahead of schedule this time and it is torture!!  Rolling over in bed is a chore!  My elbows are raw from sliding them on the sheets to lift myself up, hips hurt, getting many contractions every day.  And yes raging hormones.  If my mother in law and I still have any kind of relationship when this is over, I will be shocked.  she is driving me absolutely nuts, which is normal, but the filter between my brain and mouth is not nearly as good as it used to be (and seems to be getting worse with time!)

im 33 weeks and feeling good. not muh swelling or pains, keep getting painless b.h every 30 - 40 mins which are weird (first baby) was in hospital due to bleeding last week but that seems to have settled down, other than that everything has been great!x

i just about 33 and boy all i have to do is look at certain foods and i get the heart burn. i get pretty good jabs from my little girl that hurt now. im like avik everything seems swollen and by end of day my legs and feet really hurt. good thing is my bp keeps to its normal 104-112 over 64-72 so i know it not preeclampsia (sp) i cant stay too long in one position or my back will bother me too. i dont know about anyone else but i starting to be kinda tired of being pregnant b/c of all the achs and pains lol my hormones belive it or not have been completely under control this entire time. but thinking back i never had mood swings with my pms either so i think that might be a factor. Hang in there girls we almost there!!!

I know it sounds horrible but I am so sick of being pregnant. I can't wait til October or even the end of September! I am so uncomfortable and the heat doesn't make it any better. My hormones are also raging and I am an emotional wreck. My back is what is really bothering me and I'm getting Bracton Hicks (sp) also. I am also having the worst indegestion ever and I'm huge. I've gained like 60 pounds but I have enjoyed gaining them. lol :P. Other then that, I am just so excited to soon be holding my little girl!!

I am gonna be 31w on Friday and am having a hard time sleeping at nights because of my hip pain. Then I'll just be awake for no reason from 4-5 or sometimes fall right asleep 30min before my alarm clock goes off to wake the kids up for school. I get tons of BH and am feeling my baby hiccup everyday. She has become so much more active lately =). Going for my checkup tomorrow and am going to Boston on Saturday till Monday. I'm not supposed to fly but it was a gift from my aunt and felt bad canceling on her.I hope it all goes well with a huge belly, bags, and two kids on board.

question: hi  ladies  how are you all? im nearly at the 32 weeks mark and iv been  having  few  BH  and  im now also starting to find it a bit harder to  do thngs like  crossing my legs when i sit dwn  and  walking is becomin a little uncomfy from time to  time.  i was js wondering how all  you are feeling and what you are experiencing  lately it will b  good to  know if   some of us  are  experiencing the same things. and if  any of u  are due the same date.
title: Not long left now ladies how  u all feeling and what you experiencing?
